name: dischargeDx
description: ICD-9/10 code for discharge diagnosis. Send all available discharge diagnoses for each hospitalization. Only send diagnoses coded as 'discharge' (not 'admit' or 'inpatient').

name: dischargeDxDate
description: Date assigned to discharge diagnoses. Assign the date that the patient was discharged from the hospital (see Section 14.2).

name: ranking
description: Principal discharge diagnosis is typically ranked '1', while additional diagnoses associated with the hospitalization will be ranked as '2' or higher.

name: encounterID
description: Unique sequence number that links clinical events associated with a record in the Hospitalization table. Be sure to use the same encounterID in both the Hospitalization and DischargeDx tables.
